project_and_experience.name: SSPM
project_and_experience.brief: This project focused on the security posture of office 365.
experience: Involved in the design and development of the product from scratch.
Development involved integration with azure for security analysis, designing database tables and incorporating different AWS services like SQS, SNS, etc.

project_and_experience.name: Cloud Optix
project_and_experience.brief: It is a Cloud Security Posture Management which manages the security of AWS, GCP and/or Azure cloud infrastructure.
experience: Designed and developed an easily digestible pdf format summary of the required data points which is delivered to more than 50 thousand users on weekly basis.

Responsible for the improvement of the AWS fetcher system of inventory. This includes the introduction of a configurable retry mechanism, monitoring advancement and overall stability of the fetching system.
Helped in the development and improvement of different requirements which includes an interaction with different AWS services and code optimization.

project_and_experience.name: Sales App
project_and_experience.brief: The Sales app of Wheelseye provides a mobile-app-based solution to the complete sales team hierarchy.
experience: Design and development of an invoicing system which manages the daily sales of the service sold. It includes migrating old invoices to the new system, creating a dashboard for operation teams to handle invoices and interacting with different services to process payment.

Involved in the design and development of an update/information announcement system for the sales team to take action on. This involved creating a dashboard for the operation team to provide the update for the sales team view in the android app.

project_and_experience.name: Mibenefits
project_and_experience.brief: It is an employee benefit management portal.
experience: Involved in requirement gathering and development of different modules. Developed modules which required interaction with different services like Postgres, Elasticsearch, Redis, etc.

Involved in converting Old SpringJDBC queries to Spring JPA queries which reduced code line to 30%.
